data.name: A Feather of the Phoenix
data.desc: Discard 1 card, then target 1 card in your GY; return that target to the top of your Deck.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack

data.name: Abare Ushioni
data.desc: Once per turn, you can toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. If you call it wrong, you take 1000 damage.

data.name: Armed Samurai - Ben Kei
data.desc: For each Equip Card equipped to this card, it gains 1 additional attack during each Battle Phase.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack

data.name: Assault on GHQ
data.desc: Target 1 monster you control; destroy it, then send 2 cards from the top of your opponent's Deck to the GY.

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel: Trials of the Kingdom

data.name: Beast Soul Swap
data.desc: Target 1 Beast-Type monster you control; return it to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Beast-Type monster from your hand with the same Level as the monster that was returned to the hand.

data.name: Behemoth the King of All Animals
data.desc: This card can be Normal Summoned or Set with 1 Tribute. In that case, the original ATK of this card becomes 2000. When this card is Tribute Summoned, you can return from your Graveyard to the owner's hand a number of Beast-Type monsters equal to the number of Tributed monsters.

data.name: Big-Tusked Mammoth
data.desc: Monsters your opponent controls cannot attack the turn they are Summoned.

data.name: Blade Rabbit
data.desc: When this card is changed from Attack Position to face-up Defense Position, destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field.

data.name: Blast Magician
data.desc: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell Card resolves. You can remove any number of Spell Counters from this card, then target 1 face-up monster on the field with ATK less than or equal to the number of counters you removed x 700; destroy that target.

data.name: Brain Jacker
data.desc: FLIP: Equip this card to a monster on your opponent's side of the field and treat it as an Equip Card. Take control of the equipped monster. Your opponent gains 500 Life Points during each of their Standby Phases.

data.name: Catnipped Kitty
data.desc: This card cannot be attacked if there is another Beast-Type monster on your side of the field. Once per turn, you can make the DEF of 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field 0 until the end of this turn.

data.name: Centrifugal Field
data.desc: When a Fusion Monster(s) is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard: Its owner targets 1 Fusion Material Monster in their Graveyard that is listed on that Fusion Monster; that player Special Summons that target.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack

data.name: Chiron the Mage
data.desc: Once per turn: You can discard 1 Spell Card, then target 1 Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls; destroy that target.

card_sets.set_name: Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants

data.name: Chu-Ske the Mouse Fighter
data.desc: A fiery mouse, travelling the world to become the strongest fighter in the world of mice. Be careful not to touch him, or you will get burned.

data.name: Cross Counter
data.desc: If the DEF of an attacked Defense Position monster is higher than the ATK of your opponent's attacking monster, the Battle Damage inflicted to your opponent is doubled. Destroy the attacking monster after damage calculation.

data.name: D.D. Dynamite
data.desc: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each of their removed from play cards.

data.name: Deck Devastation Virus
data.desc: Tribute 1 DARK monster with 2000 or more ATK; look at your opponent's hand, all monsters they control, and all cards they draw until the end of their 3rd turn after this card's activation, and destroy all those monsters with 1500 or less ATK.

card_sets.set_name: Gates of the Underworld Structure Deck

data.name: Divine Dragon Ragnarok
data.desc: A legendary dragon sent by the gods as their instrument. Legends say that if provoked, the whole world will sink beneath the sea.

data.name: Element Doom
data.desc: This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field: ● EARTH: Negate the effect of an Effect Monster that this card destroyed by battle. ● WIND: If this card destroyed your opponent's monster by battle, it can attack once again in a row.

data.name: Element Valkyrie
data.desc:
(This card is not treated as a "Valkyrie" card.)
This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:
● FIRE: This card gains 500 ATK.
● WATER: Control of this card cannot switch.

data.name: Elemental Burst
data.desc: Tribute 1 each of WIND, WATER, FIRE, and EARTH monsters to activate this card. Destroy all cards on your opponent's side of the field.

data.name: Firebird
data.desc: Each time a Winged Beast-Type monster(s) on your side of the field is destroyed, this card gains 500 ATK.

data.name: Flame Ruler
data.desc: This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a FIRE monster.

card_sets.set_name: Rise of the Dragon Lords Structure Deck

data.name: Forced Ceasefire
data.desc: Discard 1 card from your hand. No Trap Cards can be activated until the end of this turn.

data.name: Fulfillment of the Contract
data.desc: Activate this card by paying 800 LP, then target 1 Ritual Monster in your GY; Special Summon it and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, banish the equipped monster.

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium
Speed Duel: Attack from the Deep

data.name: Gatling Dragon
data.desc:
"Barrel Dragon" + "Blowback Dragon"
Once per turn: You can toss a coin 3 times and destroy as many monsters on the field as possible, but not more than the number of heads.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Gearfried the Swordmaster
data.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Release Restraint". Each time an Equip Card(s) is equipped to this card: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Golem Sentry
data.desc: Once per turn: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. When this card is Flip Summoned: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; return that target to the hand.

data.name: Good Goblin Housekeeping
data.desc: Draw cards equal to the number of "Good Goblin Housekeeping" cards in your Graveyard +1, then select 1 card from your hand and return it to the bottom of your Deck.

data.name: Granmarg the Rock Monarch
data.desc: If this card is Tribute Summoned: Target 1 Set card on the field; destroy that target.

data.name: Hand of Nephthys
data.desc: You can Tribute this card and 1 other monster; Special Summon 1 "Sacred Phoenix of Nephthys" from your hand or Deck.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack

data.name: Hyena
data.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon any number of "Hyenas" from your Deck.

data.name: Insect Knight
data.desc: Of all Insect fighters, he is the paragon of the Indestructible Insect Invaders, which only the elite of the elite can join. We can no longer ignore their unmatched battle prowess.

data.name: Kangaroo Champ
data.desc: A monster that battles with this card is changed to Defense Position after damage calculation.

data.name: King Dragun
data.desc:
"Lord of D." + "Divine Dragon Ragnarok"
Your opponent cannot target Dragon monsters with card effects. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Dragon monster from your hand.

data.name: Lightning Vortex
data.desc: Discard 1 card; destroy all face-up monsters your opponent controls.

card_sets.set_name: Rise of the Dragon Lords Structure Deck
Structure Deck: Lord of the Storm

data.name: Maji-Gire Panda
data.desc: Each time a Beast-Type monster(s) on the field is destroyed, this card gains 500 ATK.

data.name: Mecha-Dog Marron
data.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, inflict 1000 damage to both players. When this card on the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard except by battle, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

data.name: Meteor of Destruction
data.desc: If your opponent's Life Points are higher than 3000: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Penalty Game!
data.desc:
When your opponent has 4 cards in their hand: Activate 1 of these effects.
● Your opponent cannot draw during their next Draw Phase.
● Your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards this turn.

data.name: Phoenix Wing Wind Blast
data.desc: Discard 1 card, then target 1 card your opponent controls; place that target on the top of the Deck.

Onslaught of the Fire Kings Structure Deck

data.name: Poison Fangs
data.desc: Each time a Beast-Type monster inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

data.name: Pole Position
data.desc: The face-up monster(s) with the highest ATK on the field is unaffected by the effects of Spell Cards. When "Pole Position" is removed from the field, destroy the face-up monster(s) with the highest ATK on the field.

data.name: Re-Fusion
data.desc: Activate this card by paying 800 LP, then target 1 Fusion Monster in your GY; Special Summon it and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, banish the equipped monster.

data.name: Release Restraint
data.desc: Tribute 1 "Gearfried the Iron Knight"; Special Summon 1 "Gearfried the Swordmaster" from your hand or Deck.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Rescue Cat
data.desc: You can send this card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 2 Level 3 or lower Beast-Type monsters from your Deck, but they have their effects negated, also they are destroyed during the End Phase. You can only use this effect of "Rescue Cat" once per turn.

data.name: Sacred Phoenix of Nephthys
data.desc: Once per turn, during your next Standby Phase after this card was destroyed by a card effect and sent to the GY: Special Summon this card from the GY. If you do: Destroy all Spells and Traps on the field.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack
Onslaught of the Fire Kings Structure Deck

data.name: Shadowslayer
data.desc: If all monsters your opponent controls are in Defense Position, this card can attack your opponent directly.

data.name: Silent Swordsman LV5
data.desc: Unaffected by your opponent's Spell effects. During your next Standby Phase after this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent by a direct attack: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Silent Swordsman LV7" from your hand or Deck.

card_sets.set_name: Duelist Pack: Rivals of the Pharaoh
Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack

data.name: Space Mambo
data.desc: A Space Mambo floating in the vast universe. This living relic was found in the ruins of a super civilization on Alphard 4.

card_sets.set_name: Structure Deck: Fury from the Deep

data.name: Spell Absorption
data.desc: Each time a Spell Card is activated, gain 500 LP immediately after it resolves.

data.name: Spiral Spear Strike
data.desc: If "Gaia The Fierce Knight", "Swift Gaia the Fierce Knight", or "Gaia the Dragon Champion" you control attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. If "Gaia the Dragon Champion" inflicts battle damage with this effect: Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card.

data.name: Swords of Concealing Light
data.desc: Destroy this card during your 2nd Standby Phase after activation. When this card resolves, change all monsters your opponent controls to face-down Defense Position. Monsters your opponent controls cannot change their battle positions.

data.name: The Big March of Animals
data.desc: Until the end of this turn, all face-up Beast-Type monsters on your side of the field gain 200 ATK for each Beast-Type monster on your side of the field.

data.name: The Dark - Hex-Sealed Fusion
data.desc: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster, but the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be correct. You can Tribute Fusion Material Monsters on the field, including this face-up card; Special Summon 1 corresponding DARK Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck.

data.name: The Earth - Hex-Sealed Fusion
data.desc: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster, but the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be correct. You can Tribute Fusion Material Monsters on the field, including this face-up card; Special Summon 1 corresponding EARTH Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack

data.name: The Light - Hex-Sealed Fusion
data.desc: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster, but the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be correct. You can Tribute Fusion Material Monsters on the field, including this face-up card; Special Summon 1 corresponding LIGHT Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck.

data.desc: Your opponent cannot declare an attack this turn.

Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack

data.name: Ultimate Insect LV5
data.desc: If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of "Ultimate Insect LV3", while it remains on the field all of your opponent's monsters lose 500 ATK. During your Standby Phase, by sending this face-up card to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Ultimate Insect LV7" from your hand or Deck. (You cannot activate this effect the turn this card is Normal Summoned, Special Summoned, or flipped face-up.)

data.name: Whirlwind Prodigy
data.desc: When Tribute Summoning a WIND monster, you can treat this 1 monster as 2 Tributes.
